Package engine.forPlayer.forAI

Class RookStructureAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
engine.forPlayer.forAI.RookStructureAnalyzer
public final class RookStructureAnalyzer extends Object
The RookStructureAnalyzer class is responsible for analyzing the rook structure on the chess board, calculating bonuses based on open files for rooks, and providing a score for rook-related factors.
